Literature.Title: Cyclic antimicrobial R-, W-rich peptides: the role of peptide structure and E. coli outer and inner membranes in activity and the mode of action.
Literature.Author: Junkes C, Harvey RD, Bruce KD, Dölling R, Bagheri M, Dathe M

Literature.Title: Membrane-Active Cyclic Amphiphilic Peptides: Broad-Spectrum Antibacterial Activity Alone and in Combination with Antibiotics.
Literature.Author: Mohammed EHM, Lohan S, Ghaffari T, Gupta S, Tiwari RK, Parang K

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:6% Hemolysis=100 µM,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=155 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=11µM),Bacillus subtilis DSM 357(MIC=3µM),Escherichia coli LWF+(MIC=19µM),Bacillus subtilis L170(MIC=50µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-1556(MIC=16µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC BAA-1705(MIC=64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27883(MIC=128µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32µg/ml)
